about_the_game:
Monstrous Characters, Volume 3


Make your game more monstrous with Monster Grin's 55 unique new tokens, each usable as PCs, NPCs, mooks, monsters, or bosses! Demons, Armored Horrors, Fiends, Mer-Beings, and more are all contained in this pack and will amp up the awesome monster potential for your game.

Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, black, silver, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of what’s what and who’s who and keep your game rockin'!

This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, red, and silver):

  • Demon Girl
  • Helmed Horror
  • Mer Being
  • Pale One
  • Wounded One

Conversion by: James Holloway

Released on May 06, 2018. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.5 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

Monstrous Characters, Volume 3


Make your game more monstrous with Monster Grin's 55 unique new tokens, each usable as PCs, NPCs, mooks, monsters, or bosses! Demons, Armored Horrors, Fiends, Mer-Beings, and more are all contained in this pack and will amp up the awesome monster potential for your game.

Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, black, silver, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of what’s what and who’s who and keep your game rockin'!

This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, red, and silver):

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
